campaigns.name: Age of the Necromancer
campaigns.description: A powerful necromancer plots to rule over Tesslandia. You and your friends must stop him before it's too late.

campaigns.name: The Lost City of Z
campaigns.description: A lost city has been discovered in the Amazon. You and your friends must explore it and uncover its secrets.

campaigns.name: The Curse of the Mummy
campaigns.description: A mummy has been unleashed upon the world. You and your friends must find a way to stop it before it's too late.
